p: Most of the drugs on the market are derived from plants [ 19]. However, the list of extracts and molecules isolated from animals is increasing [ 20, 21]. RPLO is used by the Guarani-Kaiowá community and other indigenous communities for food [ 7] and medicinal purposes [ 6]. The chemical composition of RPLO revealed the presence of saturated [palmitic acid (C16:0), 42.7%], and unsaturated fatty acids [oleic acid (C18:1) [ω-9] 40%] in proportions similar to those observed by Due et al. [ 22]. Once the chemical composition of RPLO was known, we investigated the pharmacological properties attributed to its major constituents.
